geozzle_v107.name: Geozzle - version 1.0.7
geozzle_v107.shortDescription: Update of Geozzle with new backgrounds and a loading screen!
improvements: Added new backgrounds for all continents.
Added a loading screen for the request gathering the information on a new country.

geozzle_v106.name: Geozzle - version 1.0.6
geozzle_v106.shortDescription: Update of Geozzle with new backgrounds and a mute button!
improvements: Added button to mute music and sounds.
Improved formatting for language and GDP.
bugsFixed: Fixed minor bug with missing characters.

geozzle_v100.name: Geozzle - Launch
geozzle_v100.shortDescription: First game released on both Play store and App Store! Embark on an incredible journey of world discovery with Geozzle, the ultimate geography trivia game!
geozzle_v100.release: We are delighted to announce the release of our brand new game on the Play Store and on the App Store! With a completely revamped graphical style and an innovative concept that combines entertainment and learning, we invite you to discover Geozzle on both platforms!

postrias_v221.name: Postrias - version 2.2.1
postrias_v221.shortDescription: The winter version of Postrias has been released on the PlayStore, with brand new backgrounds!
improvements: Added new backgrounds to create the winter version of Postrias.
Added popup to propose to the user to rate on the PlayStore the app after his first game.
bugsFixed: Fixed bug of infinite ads when the user continues a game.
Fixed bug of the lost of user's data when updating the app.

postrias_v211.name: Postrias - Launch
postrias_v211.shortDescription: Discover the post-apocalyptic world of Postrias, where dinosaurs have come back to life!
postrias_v211.release: We're proud to share with you the remastered version of Postrias, a game originally made in 2020 during a weekend game jam. Discover a post-apocalyptic universe overrun by dinosaurs where you are the leader of the world's last survivors; make decisions to enable your community to survive!

tramway_collector_v121.name: Tramway Collector - version 1.2.1
tramway_collector_v121.shortDescription: Tramway Collector now displays the animated Lupa logo at startup.
improvements: Added the animated LupaDevStudio logo at startup.

tramway_collector_v120.name: Tramway Collector - version 1.2.0
tramway_collector_v120.shortDescription: A new version of Tramway Collector with some modifications.
improvements: Added statistics for the total number of saved images.
bugsFixed: Fixed the bug of language refresh for the close button
Fixed missing spaces in some languages
Fixed the bug of changing the default image when modifying the tramway side.

tramway_collector_v110.name: Tramway Collector - version 1.1.0
tramway_collector_v110.shortDescription: A second version of Tramway Collector is now available on the Play Store with minor improvements.
improvements: Add a confirmation popup when importing a collection
bugsFixed: Make the back button on Android functionnal
Fix the display bug of popups in Japanese

lumacryte_v100.name: Lumacryte - Launch
lumacryte_v100.shortDescription: LupaDevStudio's very first game makes its debut on the Play Store!
lumacryte_v100.release: Created during the Open Source AI Game Jam, we decided to share this game with you one week after the competition by publishing it on Google Play.

tramway_collector_v100.name: Tramway Collector - Launch
tramway_collector_v100.shortDescription: A moment of great excitement as LupaDevStudio's first application is published on the Play Store!
tramway_collector_v100.release: LupaDevStudio is proud to share with you its very first application dedicated to collecting tramway photos!
